name: PhrogPads
description:
After polluting the lake, Dr. Crapaud has captured all the frogs, and you are the last one in the pond. Can you take don't the evil doctor and his evil robots?

This game was developed by me, Mitacla, for the MiniJam #79: Frogs.

Also, thanks to my friend nCoins who help me with some ideas and art.

Happy games!
